ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Brewing, Not Workin???
ygData.msgSnippet: Got Imporatnt, Serious , Life Threathening , Money essential  Question of Brewing. I go to my monk guild. Check on trade skills. On the Left bar all the skills
ygData.messageBody:
Got Imporatnt, Serious , Life Threathening , Money essential Question of
Brewing.

I go to my monk guild. Check on trade skills. On the Left bar all the skills
avaible for me, On the right bar Skills I have my exiting skills and the
diff lvl i have attained.

I did not find Brewing to be on the Left bar listing of Skills. .... on the
right bar Brewing is listed... so i presume i can practise on the
skill...but cant add Pratice points to it...... Right??

I go brew mend for 20+ rounds alredi... nothing. just told me.. "...donst
combine in the right quality or something..blah blah." so how?

Does Eq restricts the amount of trade skill u can have at one time? I have
Smithing, Taloiring, felcthing and Brewing in on Right bar.
